name: gulp-uncache
description: Append unique string or md5 hash to paths in html files to force refresh - remove users cache app.js -> app_8j3d7a4f.js

scripts.test: cd test && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
